benchmark_details.name: LegalBench.PT
benchmark_details.overview: LegalBench.PT is the first comprehensive legal benchmark covering key areas of Portuguese law. It measures LLMsâ€™ legal knowledge and practical application through a dataset generated from real law exams, converted into various question formats to assess legal reasoning.
benchmark_details.data_type: multiple-choice questions, true/false questions, matching questions

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMs' legal knowledge and application specific to the Portuguese legal system.

data.source: Long-form questions and answers collected from real law exams at a leading law school in Portugal.
data.annotation: Synthetic questions generated and filtered using GPT-4o, reviewed by legal professionals.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were calculated based on model responses to the benchmark questions.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate better legal knowledge and reasoning capabilities.
methodology.validation: Validated through human review by legal professionals.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data collected from real law exams with anonymized information of exam participants.
